scripts.package:change: bun changeset && git stage ./.changeset/* && git commit --m "feat: changeset" && git push
scripts.package:release: bun run deploy && && bun run package:patch && changeset version && changeset publish
scripts.package:patch: rimraf ./_release && yarn pack && mkdir ./_release && tar zxvf ./package.tgz --directory ./_release && rm ./package.tgz
scripts.deploy: bun build:sdk && bun run --cwd packages/sdk deploy
